name: match-discriminated-union
description: pattern match function for any discriminated union type

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && tsc && tsc --project tsconfig.esm.json && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > dist/cjs/package.json && echo '{"type":"module"}' > dist/esm/package.json

author: Lily Skye <me@suchipi.com>
